posts.cooked: Hi, out team consider to buy the Pigeon 2.0. What’s new in the Pigeon 2.0 compared to the previous model?

posts.name: Lavi Arzi
posts.cooked: There’s an entire comparison in the user manual.

This item is restricted for shipment in some countries. Please check international shipping restrictions before ordering.Pigeon is an IMU with 9 degrees of freedom, containing a 3-axis magnetometer, accelerometer, and gyro. The gyro has built-in...

posts.name: Diane M Walsh
posts.cooked: We are new to using the Pigeon 2.0 as well.  The CAN wires are very short.  Is this by design or can one use an extender board?
You should be able to extend them all that you need.  Either cut and splice or make some longer leads with similar connectors if you would like.
